product_name: Panaracer Fire XC Pro Mountain Tire - 26 x 2.1
long_description: Here's an all-terrain tire for all conditions to help you perform at your best. Square profile variable height Torch Tread grips all terrain all the time, while Burning Edge side knobs put cornering on rails. Color strip on sidewall made of Silica compound for added durability.
short_description: Here's an all-terrain tire for all conditions to help you perform at your best.
